title: MF Rosio [Test | First Serif]
content:
Hi,

I drew some Serif like characters that will hope to result in a new font. It's my first Serif project, and of course it's far away from done.  
Open the attachment to see the characters I've made till now.  
Everything drawn in PowerPoint. xD  
Well, I like the "a" and the name of the font.

Note again, I'm 15 and haven't yet any type designing lessons. :')

Kind regards,  
Martijn van Berkel

author: Martijn van Berkel
